value.title: Samsung develops AI processor-embedded memory chip
value.excerpt: Samsung Electronics today said that it has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) processor-embedded high bandwidth memory (HBM) chip that boasts low energy consumption and enhanced performance. The new processing-in-memory (PIM) technology will help bring powerful AI computing capabilities inside high-performance memory.
